marklogic.body: Took the words right out of my mouth. Truly the best thing not only on Tuesday but any day of the week. Night in & Night Out. Superb writing, Brian Grazer & Ron Howard are geniuses, & the man himself Jason Katims knows what the people want. If your not watching your truly missing out. Definitely without a doubt one of the most underrated shows in a while. Its NBC, what can you say. Its what they do. Whether it be Comedy Thursday or Drama Tuesday. They put out Gold & that's why they Always have the highest ratings (or at least compete with CBS for the top Spot everynight).Â
